## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-108">ABA-routeringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-109">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-110">negen cijfers met een opgemaakt of niet-opgemaakt patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-111">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-111">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-112">twee cijfers in het bereik 00-12, 21-32, 61-72 of 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-112">two digits in the ranges 00-12, 21-32, 61-72, or 80</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-113">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-113">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-114">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-114">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-115">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-116">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-116">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-117">een cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-117">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-118">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-119">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-120">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-121">Een beleid heeft het medium vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-121">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-122">De functie Func_aba_routing inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-122">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-123">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ABA_Routing gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-123">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-124">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-124">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-125">De functie Func_aba_routing inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-143">ArgentiniÃ« national identity (DNI) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-143">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-144">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-145">Acht cijfers met of zonder perioden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-145">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-146">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-146">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-147">Acht cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-147">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-148">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-148">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-149">een optionele periode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-149">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-150">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-150">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-151">een optionele periode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-151">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-152">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-152">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-153">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-154">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-154">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-155">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-156">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-156">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-157">De normale expressie Regex_argentina_national_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-157">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-158">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_argentina_national_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-158">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-170">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-170">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-171">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-172">11 cijfers met streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-172">11 digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-173">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-174">11 cijfers met een streepje:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-174">11 digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-175">twee cijfers in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 of 34</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-175">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-176">een afbreekstreester (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-176">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-177">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-177">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-178">een afbreekstreester (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-178">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-179">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-179">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-180">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-181">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-182">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-183">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-184">Met de `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-184">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-185">Er wordt een `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-185">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-186">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-187">Met de `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-187">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-226">AustraliÃ« bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-226">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-227">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-228">zes tot tien cijfers met of zonder banknummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-228">six to 10 digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-229">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-230">Accountnummer is 6 tot 10 cijfers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-230">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-231">Nummer van de australische bankstaat:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-231">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-232">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-232">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-233">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-233">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-234">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-234">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-235">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-236">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-236">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-237">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-238">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-238">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-239">De normale expressie Regex_australia_bank_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-239">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-240">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_australia_bank_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-240">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-241">De normale expressie Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-241">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-242">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-242">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-243">De normale expressie Regex_australia_bank_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-243">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-244">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_australia_bank_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-244">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-328">AustraliÃ« rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-328">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-329">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-330">negen letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-330">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-331">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-332">negen letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-332">nine letters and digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-333">twee cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-333">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-334">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-334">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-335">vijf cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-335">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-336">OF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-336">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-337">een tot twee optionele letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-337">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-338">vier tot negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-338">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-339">OF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-339">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-340">negen cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-340">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-341">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-342">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-343">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-344">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-345">De normale expressie Regex_australia_drivers_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-345">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-346">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-346">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-347">Er wordt geen trefwoord Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-347">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-447">Nummer van medische rekening australiÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-447">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-448">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-448">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-449">10-11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-449">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-450">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-450">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-451">10-11 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-451">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-452">Het eerste cijfer is in het bereik 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-452">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-453">Negende cijfer is een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-453">Ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-454">Tiende cijfer is het probleemcijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-454">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-455">Het elfde cijfer (optioneel) is het afzonderlijke getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-455">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-456">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-457">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-458">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-459">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-460">Met de Func_australian_medical_account_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-460">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-461">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-461">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-462">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-462">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-474">AustraliÃ« paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-474">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-475">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-476">acht of negen alfanumerieke tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-476">eight or nine alphanumeric characters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-477">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-477">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-478">Ã©Ã©n letter (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X), gevolgd door zeven cijfers of</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-478">one letter (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) followed by seven digits or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-479">Twee letters (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ), gevolgd door zeven cijfers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-479">Two letters (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) followed by seven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-480">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-481">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-482">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-483">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-484">Met de normale `Regex_australia_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-484">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-485">Er wordt een `Keyword_australia_passport_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-485">A keyword from `Keyword_australia_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-486">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-486">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-487">Met de normale `Regex_australia_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-487">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Australia Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-507">AustraliÃ« belastingbestandsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-507">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-508">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-509">acht tot negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-509">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-510">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-511">acht tot negen cijfers die gewoonlijk spaties als volgt worden weergegeven:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-511">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-512">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-512">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-513">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-513">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-514">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-514">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-515">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-515">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-516">twee tot drie cijfers waarbij het laatste cijfer een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-516">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-517">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-518">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-519">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-520">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-521">De functie Func_australian_tax_file_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-521">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-522">Er wordt geen trefwoord Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number of Keyword_number_exclusions gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-522">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-523">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-535">Oostenrijks rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-535">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-536">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-537">acht cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-537">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-538">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-539">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-539">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-540">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-541">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-541">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-542">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-543">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-543">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-544">Met de normale  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-544">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-545">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-545">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-672">Oostenrijk-identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-672">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-673">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-673">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-674">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-674">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-675">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-675">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-676">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-676">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-677">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-677">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-678">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-678">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-679">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-680">Een combinatie van 24 tekens van letters, cijfers en speciale tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-680">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-681">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-682">24 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-682">24 characters:</span></span>

-  <span data-ttu-id="4f534-683">22 letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig), cijfers, backslashes, slashes of plustekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-683">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-684">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig), cijfers, backslashes, slashes, plustekens of gelijktekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-684">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-685">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-686">Niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-686">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-687">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-688">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-689">Met de normale  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-689">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-690">Er wordt een  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-690">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-696">Oostenrijks paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-696">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-697">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-698">EÃ©n letter gevolgd door een optionele spatie en zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-698">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-699">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-700">Een combinatie van Ã©Ã©n letter, zeven cijfers en Ã©Ã©n spatie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-700">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-701">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-701">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-702">Ã©Ã©n spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-702">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-703">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-703">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-704">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-705">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-705">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-706">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-707">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-707">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-708">Met de normale  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-708">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-709">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-709">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-710">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-710">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-711">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-711">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-712">Met de normale  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-712">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-713">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-713">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-737">Oostenrijks sociaal-zekerheidsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-737">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-738">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-739">10 cijfers in de opgegeven notatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-739">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-740">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-741">10 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-741">10 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-742">drie cijfers die overeenkomen met een serieel getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-742">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-743">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-743">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-744">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-744">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-745">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-746">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-746">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-747">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-748">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-749">Met de  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-749">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-750">een trefwoord  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` uit wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-750">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-751">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-751">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-752">Met de  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-752">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-778">Oostenrijks btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-778">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-779">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-780">negen cijfers met optioneel afbreekstreester en schuine streep</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-780">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-781">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-782">negen cijfers met optioneel afbreekstreester en schuine streep vooruit:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-782">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-783">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-784">een afbreekstreester (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-784">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-785">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-785">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-786">a forward slash (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-786">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-787">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-787">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-788">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-789">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-789">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-790">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-791">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-792">Met de  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-792">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-793">Er wordt een  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-793">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-794">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-795">Met de  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-795">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-797">Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-797">Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-798">Ã¶sterreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-798">Ã¶sterreich</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-799">st.nr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-799">st.nr.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-800">steuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-800">steuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-801">belasting-id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-801">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-802">geen belastingidentificatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-802">tax identification no</span></span>

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-818">Oostenrijks belasting over toegevoegde waarde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-818">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-819">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-819">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-820">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-821">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-821">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-822">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-822">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-823">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-823">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-824">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-824">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-825">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-826">Alfanumeriek patroon van 11 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-826">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-827">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-828">Alfanumeriek patroon van 11 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-828">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-829">A of een</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-829">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-830">T of t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-830">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-831">Optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-831">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-832">U of u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-832">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-833">optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-833">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-834">twee of drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-834">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-835">optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-835">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-836">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-836">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-837">optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-837">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-838">een of twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-838">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-839">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-840">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-840">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-841">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-842">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-842">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-843">Met de Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-843">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-844">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-844">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-845">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-845">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-846">Met de Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-846">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-864">Azure DocumentDB auth-toets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-864">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-865">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-866">De tekenreeks 'DocumentDb', gevolgd door de tekens en tekenreeksen die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-866">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-867">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-868">De tekenreeks 'DocumentDb'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-868">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-869">Een combinatie van 3-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-869">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-870">Een groter dan symbool (>), een gelijkteken (=), een aanhalingsteken ("), of een apostrof (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-870">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-871">Elke combinatie van 86 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, slash (/) of plusteken (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-871">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-872">Twee gelijke tekens (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-872">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-873">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-874">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-875">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-876">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-877">De normale expressie CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-877">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-878">In de CEP_CommonExampleKeywords wordt geen inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-878">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-879">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-879">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-881">(Technisch gezien identificeert dit type gevoelige informatie deze trefwoorden met behulp van een gewone expressie, niet met een trefwoordlijst.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-881">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-883">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-883">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-884">noordenwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-884">northwind</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-888">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-888">127.0.0.1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-891">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-891">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4f534-892">netto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-892">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-893">Azure IAAS-databaseverbindingsreeks en Azure SQL-verbindingsreeks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-893">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-894">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-894">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-895">De tekenreeks 'Server', 'server' of 'gegevensbron', gevolgd door de tekens en tekenreeksen die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven, inclusief de tekenreeks 'cloudapp.azure..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-895">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4f534-896">com' of 'cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-896">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4f534-897">net" of "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-897">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4f534-898">en de tekenreeks 'Wachtwoord' of 'wachtwoord' of 'pwd'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-898">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-899">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-899">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-900">de tekenreeks 'Server', 'server' of 'gegevensbron'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-900">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-901">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-901">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-902">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-902">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-903">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-903">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-904">een combinatie van 1-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-904">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-905">De tekenreeks 'cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-905">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4f534-906">com', 'cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-906">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4f534-907">net", of "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-907">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4f534-908">netto"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-908">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-909">een combinatie van 1-300 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-909">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-910">de tekenreeks 'Wachtwoord', 'wachtwoord' of 'pwd'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-910">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-911">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-911">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-912">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-912">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-913">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-913">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-914">een of meer tekens die geen puntkomma (;), aanhalingsteken (") of apostrof (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-914">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-915">een puntkomma (;), aanhalingsteken (") of apostrof (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-915">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-916">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-917">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-917">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-918">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-918">Definition</span></span>

```xml
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-936">Azure IoT-verbindingsreeks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-936">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-937">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-937">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-938">De tekenreeks 'HostName' gevolgd door de tekens en tekenreeksen die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven, inclusief de tekenreeksen 'azure-devices'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-938">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4f534-939">net" en "SharedAccessKey".</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-939">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-940">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-940">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-941">de tekenreeks 'HostName'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-941">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-942">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-942">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-943">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-943">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-944">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-944">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-945">een combinatie van 1-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-945">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-946">de tekenreeks 'azure-devices'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-946">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="4f534-947">netto"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-947">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-948">een combinatie van 1-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-948">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-949">de tekenreeks 'SharedAccessKey'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-949">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-950">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-950">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-951">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-951">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-952">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-952">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-953">een combinatie van 43 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, slash (/) of plusteken (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-953">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-954">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-954">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-955">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-955">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-956">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-956">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-958">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-958">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-959">De normale expressie CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-959">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-960">In de CEP_CommonExampleKeywords wordt geen inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-960">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">

        </Any>
```
