## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2100">Canada social insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2100">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2101">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2102">negen cijfers met optionele afbreekstree streepjes of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2102">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2103">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2104">Opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2104">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2105">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2105">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2106">een afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2106">a hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2107">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2107">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2108">een afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2108">a hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2109">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2109">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2110">Niet-opgemaakt: negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2110">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2111">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2111">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2112">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2112">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2113">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2113">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2114">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2114">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2115">De functie Func_canadian_sin inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2115">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2116">Ten minste twee van de volgende patronen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2116">At least two of the following patterns:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2117">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_sin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2117">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2118">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_sin_collaborative gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2118">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2119">Met de Func_eu_date wordt een datum in de juiste datumnotatie gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2119">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2120">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2120">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2121">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2121">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2122">De functie Func_unformatted_canadian_sin inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2122">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2123">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_sin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2123">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2124">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2124">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2149">Chili-identiteitskaartnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2149">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2150">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2151">zeven tot acht cijfers plus scheidingstekens van een vinkje of letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2151">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2152">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2153">zeven tot acht cijfers plus scheidingstekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2153">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2154">Ã©Ã©n tot twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2154">one to two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2155">een optionele periode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2155">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2156">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2156">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2157">een optionele periode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2157">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2158">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2158">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2159">een streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2159">a dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2160">een cijfer of letter (niet case-sensitive) dat is een controlecijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2160">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2161">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2161">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2162">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2162">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2163">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2163">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2164">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2164">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2165">De functie Func_chile_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2165">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2166">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_chile_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2166">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2167">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2167">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2168">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2168">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2169">De functie Func_chile_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2169">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2170">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2170">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2207">China Resident Identity Card (PRC) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2207">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2208">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2209">18 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2209">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2210">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2210">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2211">18 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2211">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2212">zes cijfers die een adrescode zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2212">six digits that are an address code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2213">acht cijfers in het formulier YYYYMMDD, de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2213">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2214">drie cijfers die een ordercode zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2214">three digits that are an order code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2215">een cijfer dat een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2215">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2216">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2217">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2217">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2218">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2219">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2219">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2220">De functie Func_china_resident_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2220">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2221">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_china_resident_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2221">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2222">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2222">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2223">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2223">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2224">De functie Func_china_resident_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2224">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2225">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2225">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2238">Creditcardnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2238">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2239">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2239">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2240">14 tot 16 cijfers die kunnen worden opgemaakt of niet-opgemaakt (dddddd) en die de Luhn-toets moeten doorstaan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2240">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2241">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2241">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2242">Detecteert kaarten van alle grote merken wereldwijd, waaronder Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, cadeaukaarten en dinerkaarten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2242">Detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2243">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2244">Ja, de Luhn-checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2244">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2245">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2246">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2246">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2247">De functie Func_credit_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2247">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2248">Een van de volgende gegevens is waar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2248">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2249">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_cc_verification gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2249">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2250">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_cc_name gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2250">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2251">Met de Func_expiration_date wordt een datum in de juiste datumnotatie gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2251">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2252">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2253">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2253">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2254">De functie Func_credit_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2254">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2255">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2255">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2515">Nummer van het rijbewijs van KroatiÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2515">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2516">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2517">acht cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2517">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2518">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2518">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2519">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2519">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2520">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2521">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2522">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2523">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2523">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2524">Met de normale  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2524">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2525">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2525">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2526">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2526">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2530">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2530">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2531">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2531">driverlicenses</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2648">vozaÄke dozvole</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2648">vozaÄke dozvole</span></span>


## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2649">Nummer van kroatische identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2649">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2650">Deze entiteit is opgenomen in het gevoelige informatietype EU National Identification Number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2650">This entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2651">Het is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2651">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2652">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2652">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2653">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2653">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2654">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2654">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2655">negen opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2655">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2656">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2657">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2657">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2658">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2659">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2659">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2660">Met de Func_croatia_id_card wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2660">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2661">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_croatia_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2661">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2662">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2662">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2692">KroatiÃ«-paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2692">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2693">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2694">negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2694">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2695">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2696">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2696">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2697">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2698">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2698">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2699">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2700">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2700">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2701">Met de normale  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2701">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2702">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2702">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2703">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2703">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2704">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2704">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2705">Met de normale  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2705">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2706">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2706">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2724">OIB-nummer (Persoonlijke identificatie van KroatiÃ«)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2724">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2725">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2725">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2726">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2726">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2727">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2727">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2728">11 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2728">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2729">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2729">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2730">laatste cijfer is een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2730">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2731">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2732">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2732">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2733">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2734">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2734">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2735">De functie Func_croatia_oib_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2735">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2736">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2736">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2737">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2737">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2738">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2738">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2739">De functie Func_croatia_oib_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2739">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2740">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2740">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2771">Cyprus drivers license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2771">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2772">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2772">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2773">12 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2773">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2774">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2774">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2775">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2775">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2776">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2776">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2777">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2777">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2778">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2778">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2779">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2779">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2780">Met de normale  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2780">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2781">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2781">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2906">Cyprus-identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2906">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2907">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2907">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2908">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2908">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2909">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2909">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2910">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2910">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2911">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2911">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2912">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2912">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2913">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2913">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2914">10 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2914">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2915">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2915">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2916">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2916">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2917">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2918">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2918">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2919">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2920">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2920">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2921">Met de normale  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2921">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2922">Er wordt een  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2922">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2931">Cyprus paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2931">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2932">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2932">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2933">een letter gevolgd door 6-8 cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2933">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2934">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2934">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2935">een letter gevolgd door zes tot acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2935">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2936">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2937">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2937">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2938">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2939">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2939">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2940">Met de normale  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2940">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2941">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2941">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2942">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` indeling DD/MM/YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2942">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2943">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2943">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2944">Met de normale  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2944">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2945">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2945">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2974">Btw-nummer cyprus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2974">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2975">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2975">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2976">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2976">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2977">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2977">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2978">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2978">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2979">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2979">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2980">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2980">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2981">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2981">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2982">acht cijfers en Ã©Ã©n letter in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2982">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2983">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2983">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2984">acht cijfers en Ã©Ã©n letter:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2984">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2985">een '0' of '9'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2985">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2986">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2986">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2987">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2987">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2988">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2988">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2989">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2989">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2990">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2990">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2991">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2991">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2992">Met de  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2992">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2993">Er wordt een  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2993">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-2994">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2994">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2995">Met de  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2995">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2996">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2996">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-2997">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2997">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2998">belasting-id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2998">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-2999">belastingidentificatiecode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-2999">tax identification code</span></span>

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3023">Tsjechisch rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3023">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3024">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3024">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3025">twee letters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3025">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3026">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3026">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3027">acht letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3027">eight letters and digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3028">letter 'E' (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3028">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3029">een brief</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3029">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3030">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3030">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3031">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3031">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3032">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3032">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3033">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3033">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3034">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3034">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3035">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3035">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3036">Met de normale  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3036">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3037">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3037">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3163">Tsjechisch paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3163">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3164">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3164">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3165">acht cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3165">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3166">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3166">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3167">acht cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3167">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3168">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3168">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3169">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3169">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3170">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3170">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3171">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3171">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3172">Met de normale  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3172">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3173">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3173">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3174">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3174">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3175">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3175">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3176">Met de normale  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3176">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3177">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3177">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3199">Tsjechisch persoonlijk identiteitsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3199">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3200">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3201">negen cijfers met optionele slash (oude opmaak) 10 cijfers met optionele slash vooruit (nieuwe indeling)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3201">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3202">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3203">negen cijfers (oude notatie):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3203">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3204">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3204">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3205">een optionele slash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3205">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3206">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3206">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3207">10 cijfers (nieuwe indeling):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3207">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3208">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3208">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3209">een optionele slash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3209">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3210">vier cijfers waarbij het laatste cijfer een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3210">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3211">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3212">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3213">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3214">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3214">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3215">De functie Func_czech_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3215">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3216">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_czech_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3216">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3217">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3218">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3218">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3219">De functie Func_czech_id_card_new_format inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3219">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3220">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3267">Het rijbewijsnummer van Denemarken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3267">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3268">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3269">acht cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3269">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3270">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3271">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3271">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3272">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3273">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3273">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3274">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3275">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3275">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3276">Met de normale  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3276">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3277">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3277">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3401">Denemarken paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3401">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3402">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3402">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3403">negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3403">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3404">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3404">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3405">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3405">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3406">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3407">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3407">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3408">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3409">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3409">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3410">Met de normale  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3410">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3411">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3411">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3412">Met de normale `Regex_eu_passport_date2` expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling DD MM YY of wordt een trefwoord uit `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3412">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3413">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3413">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3414">Met de normale  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3414">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3415">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3415">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3435">Persoonlijk identificatienummer van Denemarken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3435">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3436">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3436">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3437">10 cijfers met een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3437">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3438">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3438">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3439">10 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3439">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3440">zes cijfers in de indeling DDMMYY, de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3440">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3441">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3441">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3442">vier cijfers waarbij het uiteindelijke cijfer een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3442">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3443">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3444">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-3445">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3446">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3446">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3447">De normale expressie Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3447">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3448">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_denmark_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3448">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3449">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3449">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-3450">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3450">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3451">De normale expressie Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3451">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-3452">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-3452">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
    <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
