## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-6913">Japans sociaal verzekeringsnummer (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6913">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-6914">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-6915">7-12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6915">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-6916">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-6917">7-12 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6917">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-6918">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6918">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-6919">een afbreekstreester (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6919">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-6920">zes cijfers OF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6920">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-6921">7-12 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6921">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-6922">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6922">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-6923">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6923">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-6924">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6924">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-6925">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6925">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-6926">Met de Func_jp_sin wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6926">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-6927">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_sin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6927">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-6928">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6928">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-6929">Met de Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6929">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-6930">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_jp_sin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6930">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-6931">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6931">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-6932">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6932">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-6933">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6933">Social Insurance No.</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-6951">Letlandse nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6951">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-6952">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6952">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-6953">drie letters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6953">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-6954">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6954">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-6955">drie letters en zes cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6955">three letters and six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-6956">drie letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6956">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-6957">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6957">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-6958">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6958">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-6959">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6959">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-6960">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6960">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-6961">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6961">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-6962">Met de normale  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6962">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-6963">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-6963">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7088">Persoonlijke code letland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7088">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7089">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7089">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7090">11 cijfers en een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7090">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7091">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7091">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7092">Oude indeling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7092">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7093">11 cijfers en een afbreekstreester:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7093">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7094">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7094">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7095">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7095">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7096">een cijfer dat overeenkomt met de eeuw van geboorte ("0" voor de 19e eeuw, "1" voor de 20e eeuw en "2" voor de 21e eeuw)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7096">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7097">vier cijfers, willekeurig gegenereerd</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7097">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7098">Nieuwe indeling</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7098">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7099">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7099">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7100">Twee cijfers "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7100">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7101">Negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7101">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7102">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7102">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7103">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7103">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7104">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7104">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7105">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7105">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7106">Met de  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` functie of regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7106">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7107">Er wordt een  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7107">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7108">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7108">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7109">Met de  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` functie of regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7109">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7172">Letland paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7172">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7173">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7174">twee letters of cijfers gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7174">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7175">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7175">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7176">twee letters of cijfers, gevolgd door zeven cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7176">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7177">twee cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7177">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7178">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7178">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7179">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7179">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7180">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7180">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7181">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7181">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7182">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7182">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7183">Met de normale  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7183">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7184">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7184">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7185">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7185">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7186">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7187">Met de normale  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7187">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7188">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7188">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7211">Litouws rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7211">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7212">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7212">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7213">acht cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7213">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7214">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7214">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7215">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7215">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7216">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7217">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7217">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7218">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7219">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7219">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7220">Met de normale  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7220">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7221">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7221">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7346">Persoonlijke code litouwen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7346">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7347">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7347">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7348">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7348">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7349">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7349">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7350">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7350">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7351">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7351">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7352">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7352">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7353">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7354">11 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7354">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7355">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7356">11 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7356">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7357">Ã©Ã©n cijfer (1-6) dat overeenkomt met het geslacht en de eeuw van de geboorte van de persoon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7357">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7358">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met geboortedatum (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7358">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7359">drie cijfers die overeenkomen met het seriÃ«le getal van de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7359">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7360">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7360">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7361">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7362">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7362">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7363">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7364">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7364">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7365">Met de  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7365">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7366">Er wordt een  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7366">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7367">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7367">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7368">Met de  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7368">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7403">Litouws paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7403">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7404">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7405">acht cijfers of letters zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7405">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7406">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7407">acht cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7407">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7408">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7408">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7409">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7409">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7410">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7410">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7411">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7411">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7412">Met de normale  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7412">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7413">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7413">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7414">Met de normale `Regex_eu_passport_date3` expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling DD MM YYYY of wordt een trefwoord van `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7414">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7415">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7415">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7416">Met de normale  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7416">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7417">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7417">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7437">Luxemburgs rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7437">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7438">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7438">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7439">zes cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7439">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7440">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7440">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7441">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7441">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7442">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7442">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7443">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7443">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7444">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7444">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7445">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7445">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7446">Met de normale  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7446">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7447">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7447">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7571">Luxemburgs nationaal identificatienummer (natuurlijke personen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7571">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7572">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7572">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7573">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7573">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7574">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7574">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7575">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7575">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7576">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7576">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7577">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7577">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7578">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7578">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7579">13 cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7579">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7580">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7580">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7581">13 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7581">13 digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7582">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7582">11 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7583">twee controlecijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7583">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7584">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7585">ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7585">yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7586">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7587">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7587">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7588">Met de  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7588">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7589">Er wordt een  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7589">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7590">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7590">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7591">Met de  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7591">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7614">Luxemburgs paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7614">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7615">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7615">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7616">acht cijfers of letters zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7616">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7617">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7617">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7618">acht cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7618">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7619">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7619">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7620">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7620">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7621">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7621">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7622">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7622">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7623">Met de normale  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7623">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7624">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7624">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7625">Met de normale `Regex_eu_passport_date3` expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling DD MM YYYY of wordt een trefwoord van `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7625">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7626">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7626">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7627">Met de normale  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7627">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7628">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7628">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7631">paspoort #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7631">passport#</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7660">Luxemburgs nationaal identificatienummer (niet-natuurlijke personen)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7660">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7661">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7662">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7662">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7663">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7664">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7664">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7665">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7665">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7666">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7666">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7667">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7667">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7668">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7668">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7669">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7669">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7670">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7670">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7671">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7671">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7672">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7672">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7673">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7673">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7674">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7674">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7675">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7675">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7676">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7676">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7677">Met de  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7677">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7678">Er wordt een  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7678">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7679">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7679">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7680">Met de  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7680">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7720">Nummer van maleisische identificatiekaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7720">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7721">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7722">12 cijfers met optionele afbreekstree streepjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7722">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7723">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7724">12 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7724">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7725">zes cijfers in de notatie YYMMDD, de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7725">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7726">een streepje (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7726">a dash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7727">Plaats-van-geboortecode met twee letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7727">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7728">een streepje (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7728">a dash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7729">drie willekeurige cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7729">three random digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7730">geslachtscode met Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7730">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7731">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7732">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7732">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7733">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7734">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7734">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7735">De normale expressie Regex_malaysia_id_card_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7735">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7736">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7736">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7763">Malta-nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7763">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7764">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7765">Combinatie van twee tekens en zes cijfers in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7765">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7766">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7767">combinatie van twee tekens en zes cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7767">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7768">twee tekens (cijfers of letters, niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7768">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7769">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7769">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7770">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7770">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7771">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7771">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7772">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7772">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7773">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7774">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7774">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7775">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7776">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7776">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7777">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7777">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7778">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7778">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7902">Malta-identiteitskaartnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7902">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7903">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7903">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7904">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7904">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7905">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7905">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7906">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7906">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7907">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7907">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7908">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7908">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7909">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7910">zeven cijfers, gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7910">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7911">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7911">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7912">zeven cijfers, gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n letter:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7912">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7913">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7913">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7914">Ã©Ã©n letter in 'M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z' (case insensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7914">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7915">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7915">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7916">Niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7916">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7917">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7917">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7918">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7918">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7919">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7919">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7920">Er wordt een  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7920">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7921">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7921">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7922">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7922">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7939">Malta-paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7939">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7940">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7940">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7941">zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7941">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7942">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7942">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7943">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7943">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7944">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7945">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7946">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7947">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7948">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7948">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7949">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7949">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7950">Er wordt een `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trefwoord uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7950">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7951">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7951">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7952">Met de normale  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7952">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7953">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7953">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7973">Malta-nummer voor belastingidentificatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7973">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7974">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7975">Voor Maltese nationals:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7975">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7976">zeven cijfers en Ã©Ã©n letter in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7976">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7977">Niet-Maltese nationals en Maltese entiteiten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7977">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7978">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7978">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7979">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7980">Maltese nationals: zeven cijfers en Ã©Ã©n letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7980">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7981">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7981">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7982">Ã©Ã©n letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7982">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7983">Niet-Maltese nationals en Maltese entiteiten: negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7983">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7984">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7984">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7985">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7985">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7986">Niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7986">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-7987">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7987">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7988">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7988">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7989">De regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7989">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7990">Er wordt een  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7990">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-7991">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7991">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-7992">De regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-7992">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8025">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI)-kaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8025">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8026">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8026">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8027">Alfanumeriek patroon van 11 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8027">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8028">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8028">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8029">Ã©Ã©n cijfer tussen 1 en 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8029">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8030">Ã©Ã©n letter exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8030">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8031">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8031">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8032">Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8032">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8033">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8033">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8034">Ã©Ã©n letter exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8034">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8035">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8035">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8036">Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8036">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8037">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8037">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8038">twee letters exclusief S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8038">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8039">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8039">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8040">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8040">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8041">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8041">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8042">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8042">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8043">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8043">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8044">Met de normale  `Regex_mbi_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8044">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8045">Er wordt een  `Keyword_mbi_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8045">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8046">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8046">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8047">Met de normale  `Regex_mbi_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8047">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
