## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8057">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8057">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8058">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8058">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8059">Alfanumeriek patroon van 18 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8059">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8060">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8060">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8061">vier letters (hoofdletters ongevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8061">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8062">zes cijfers die een geldige datum aangeven</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8062">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8063">een letter - H/h of M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8063">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8064">twee letters die een geldige Mexicaanse staatscode aangeven</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8064">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8065">drie letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8065">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8066">Ã©Ã©n letter of cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8066">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8067">Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8067">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8068">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8068">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8069">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8069">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8070">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8070">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8071">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8071">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8072">Met de  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8072">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8073">Er wordt een  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8073">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8074">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8074">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8075">Met de  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8075">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8096">BSN-nummer (Nederlandse burgerservice)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8096">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8097">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8097">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8098">acht of negen cijfers met optionele spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8098">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8099">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8099">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8100">acht-negen cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8100">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8101">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8101">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8102">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8102">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8103">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8103">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8104">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8104">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8105">twee-drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8105">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8106">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8107">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8107">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8108">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8109">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8110">De functie Func_netherlands_bsn inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8110">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8111">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_netherlands_bsn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8111">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8112">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8112">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8136">Nederlands rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8136">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8137">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8138">10 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8138">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8139">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8140">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8140">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8141">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8141">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8142">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8142">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8143">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8143">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8144">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8144">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8145">Met de normale  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8145">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8146">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8146">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8274">Nederlands paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8274">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8275">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8276">negen letters of cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8276">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8277">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8278">negen letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8278">nine letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8279">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8280">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8280">not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8281">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8282">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8282">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8283">Met de normale  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8283">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8284">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8284">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8285">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Voorbeeld - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8285">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8286">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8286">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8287">Met de normale  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8287">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8288">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8288">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8306">Btw-nummer van Nederland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8306">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8307">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8307">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8308">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8308">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8309">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8309">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8310">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8310">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8311">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8311">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8312">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8312">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8313">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8313">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8314">negen cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8314">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8315">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8316">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8316">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8317">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8317">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8318">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8318">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8319">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8319">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8320">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8320">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8321">Met de  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8321">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8322">Er wordt een  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8322">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8323">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8323">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8324">Met de  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8324">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8325">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8325">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8326">Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8326">Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8362">Btw-nummer voor Nederland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8362">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8363">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8363">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8364">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8364">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8365">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8365">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8366">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8366">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8367">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8367">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8368">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8368">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8369">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8370">Alfanumeriek patroon van 14 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8370">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8371">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8372">Alfanumeriek patroon van 14 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8372">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8373">N of n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8373">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8374">L of l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8374">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8375">optionele spatie, punt of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8375">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8376">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8376">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8377">optionele spatie, punt of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8377">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8378">B of b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8378">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8379">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8379">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8380">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8381">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8381">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8382">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8383">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8384">De functie Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8384">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8385">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8385">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8386">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8386">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8387">De functie Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8387">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8389">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8389">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8396">Nieuw-Zeelands bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8396">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8397">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8397">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8398">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8398">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8399">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8399">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8400">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8400">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8401">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8401">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8402">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8402">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8403">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8403">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8404">14-cijferig tot 16-cijferig patroon met optioneel scheidingsteken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8404">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8405">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8405">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8406">14-cijferig tot 16-cijferig patroon met optioneel scheidingsteken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8406">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8407">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8407">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8408">een optioneel afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8408">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8409">drie tot vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8409">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8410">een optioneel afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8410">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8411">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8411">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8412">een optioneel afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8412">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8413">twee tot drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8413">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8414">een afbreekstreester of spatie met opties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8414">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8415">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8416">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8416">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8417">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8418">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8418">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8419">Met de Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8419">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8420">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8420">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8421">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8421">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8422">Met de Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8422">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8430">Nieuw-Zeelands rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8430">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8431">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8431">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8432">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8432">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8433">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8433">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8434">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8434">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8435">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8435">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8436">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8436">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8437">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8438">alfanumeriek patroon van acht tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8438">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8439">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8440">alfanumeriek patroon van acht tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8440">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8441">twee letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8441">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8442">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8442">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8443">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8444">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8445">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8446">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8446">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8447">De functie Func_newzealand_driver_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8447">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8448">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8448">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8449">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8449">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8450">De functie Func_newzealand_driver_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8450">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8517">Nieuw-Zeelandse belastingdienst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8517">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8518">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8518">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8519">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8519">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8520">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8520">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8521">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8521">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8522">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8522">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8523">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8523">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8524">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8524">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8525">acht of negen cijfers met optionele scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8525">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8526">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8527">acht of negen cijfers met optionele scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8527">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8528">twee of drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8528">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8529">een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8529">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8530">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8530">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8531">een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8531">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8532">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8532">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8533">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8533">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8534">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8534">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8535">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8535">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8536">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8536">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8537">De functie Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8537">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8538">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8538">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8539">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8539">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8540">De functie Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8540">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8549">Nieuw-Zeelands ministerie van gezondheid nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8549">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8550">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8550">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8551">drie letters, een spatie (optioneel) en vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8551">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8552">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8552">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8553">drie letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig), behalve 'I' en 'O'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8553">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8554">een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8554">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8555">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8555">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8556">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8557">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8557">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8558">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8559">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8559">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8560">Met de Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8560">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8561">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_nz_terms gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8561">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8562">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8562">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8563">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8563">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8564">Met de Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8564">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8565">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8565">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8579">Nieuw-Zeelandse sociale zekerheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8579">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8580">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8580">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8581">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8581">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8582">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8582">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8583">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8583">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8584">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8584">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8585">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8585">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8586">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8587">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8587">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8588">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8589">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8589">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8590">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8590">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8591">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8591">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8592">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8592">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8593">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8593">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8594">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8594">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8595">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8596">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8596">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8597">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8598">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8598">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8599">De functie Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8599">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8600">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8600">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8601">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8601">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8602">De functie Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8602">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8610">Noorwegen-identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8610">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8611">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8612">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8612">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8613">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8613">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8614">11 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8614">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8615">zes cijfers in de indeling DDMMYY, de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8615">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8616">individueel getal met drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8616">three-digit individual number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8617">twee controlecijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8617">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8618">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8618">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8619">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8619">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8620">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8620">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8621">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8621">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8622">Met de Func_norway_id_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8622">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8623">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_norway_id_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8623">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8624">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8624">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8625">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8625">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8626">De functie Func_norway_id_numbe inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8626">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8627">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8627">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8628">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8628">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8629">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8629">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8631">Noors id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8631">Norwegian ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8632">Id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8632">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8633">Identificatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8633">Identification</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8636">Verenigd identificatienummer voor meerdere doeleinden in de Filipijnen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8636">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8637">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8637">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8638">12 cijfers gescheiden door afbreekstree streepjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8638">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8639">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8639">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8640">12 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8640">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8641">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8641">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8642">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8642">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8643">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8643">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8644">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8644">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8645">Ã©Ã©n cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8645">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8646">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8647">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8647">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8648">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8649">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8649">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8650">De normale expressie Regex_philippines_unified_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8650">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8651">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_philippines_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8651">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8652">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8652">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8653">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8653">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8654">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8654">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8655">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8655">UMID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8658">Licentienummer van Polen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8658">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8659">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8660">14 cijfers met twee schuine schuine streep</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8660">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8661">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8662">14 cijfers en twee slashes vooruit:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8662">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8663">vijf cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8663">five digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8664">een slash naar voren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8664">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8665">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8665">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8666">een slash naar voren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8666">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8667">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8667">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8668">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8669">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8669">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8670">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8671">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8671">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8672">Met de normale  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8672">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8673">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8673">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8798">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8798">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8799">drie letters en zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8799">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8800">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8800">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8801">drie letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8801">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8802">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8802">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8803">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8803">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8804">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8804">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8805">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8805">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8806">De functie Func_polish_national_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8806">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8807">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8807">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8808">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8808">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8812">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8812">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8813">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8813">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8814">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8814">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8815">Nazwa i nr dowodu toÅ¼samoÅci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8815">Nazwa i nr dowodu toÅ¼samoÅci</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8816">DowÃ³d ToÅ¼samoÅci</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8816">DowÃ³d ToÅ¼samoÅci</span></span>

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8819">Nationale Polen-id (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8819">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8820">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8820">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8821">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8821">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8822">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8822">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8823">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum in de notatie YYMMDD vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8823">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8824">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8824">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8825">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8825">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8826">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8826">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8827">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8827">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8828">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8828">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8829">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8829">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8830">Met de Func_pesel_identification_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8830">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8831">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_pesel_identification_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8831">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8832">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8832">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8833">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8833">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8834">Met de Func_pesel_identification_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8834">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8835">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8835">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8837">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8837">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8838">dowÃ³d osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8838">dowoÌd osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8839">dowÃ³dosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8839">dowoÌdosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8840">niepowtarzalny-numerieke waarde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8840">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8841">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8841">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8842">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8842">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8843">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8843">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8844">numerieke identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8844">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8845">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8845">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8846">toÅ¼samoÅci narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8846">tozÌsamosÌci narodowej</span></span>


## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8847">Polen paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8847">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8848">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie is opgenomen in het gevoelige informatietype EU-paspoortnummer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8848">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8849">Het is ook beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8849">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8850">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8850">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8851">twee letters en zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8851">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8852">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8852">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8853">Twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8853">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8854">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8854">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8855">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8855">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-8856">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8856">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8857">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8857">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8858">Met de `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8858">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8859">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8859">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8860">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8860">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8861">Er wordt een `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8861">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8862">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8862">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8863">Met de `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8863">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8864">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8864">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8865">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8865">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-8866">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8866">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8867">Met de `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8867">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-8868">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-8868">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
