## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10079">Nummer van belastingidentificatie van SloveniÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10079">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10080">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10080">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10081">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10081">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10082">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10082">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10083">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10083">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10084">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10084">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10085">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10085">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10086">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10087">acht cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10087">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10088">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10088">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10089">Ã©Ã©n cijfer van 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10089">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10090">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10090">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10091">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10091">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10092">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10092">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10093">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10093">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10094">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10094">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10095">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10095">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10096">Met de  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10096">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10097">Er wordt een  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10097">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10098">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10098">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10099">Met de  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10099">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10123">Zuid-Afrika-identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10123">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10124">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10124">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10125">13 cijfers die spaties kunnen bevatten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10125">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10126">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10126">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10127">13 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10127">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10128">zes cijfers in de notatie YYMMDD, de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10128">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10129">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10129">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10130">een indicator voor een eencijferig burgerschap</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10130">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10131">het cijfer '8' of '9'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10131">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10132">Ã©Ã©n cijfer, een checksum-cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10132">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10133">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10134">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10134">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10135">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10136">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10136">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10137">Met de Func_south_africa_identification_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10137">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10138">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_south_africa_identification_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10138">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10139">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10139">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10145">Registratienummer voor inwoners van Zuid-Korea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10145">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10146">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10147">13 cijfers met een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10147">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10148">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10148">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10149">13 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10149">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10150">zes cijfers in de notatie YYMMDD, de geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10150">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10151">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10151">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10152">Ã©Ã©n cijfer dat wordt bepaald door de eeuw en het geslacht</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10152">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10153">viercijferige regio-van-geboortecode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10153">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10154">een cijfer dat wordt gebruikt om onderscheid te maken tussen personen voor wie de voorgaande getallen identiek zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10154">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10155">een vinkje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10155">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10156">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10157">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10157">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10158">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10159">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10159">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10160">De functie Func_south_korea_resident_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10160">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10161">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_south_korea_resident_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10161">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10162">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10162">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10163">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10163">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10164">De functie Func_south_korea_resident_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10164">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10165">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10165">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10173">Rijbewijsnummer van Spanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10173">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10174">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10175">acht cijfers gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n teken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10175">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10176">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10177">acht cijfers, gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n teken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10177">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10178">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10178">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10179">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10179">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10180">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10181">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10182">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10183">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10184">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10184">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10185">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10185">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10186">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10187">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10187">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10321">Spanje DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10321">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10322">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10322">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10323">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10323">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10324">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10324">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10325">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10325">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10326">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10326">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10327">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10327">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10328">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10328">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10329">acht cijfers gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n teken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10329">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10330">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10330">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10331">zeven cijfers gevolgd door Ã©Ã©n teken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10331">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10332">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10332">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10333">Een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10333">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10334">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10334">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10335">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10336">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10336">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10337">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10338">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10338">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10339">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10339">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10340">Er wordt een  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10340">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10341">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10341">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10342">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10342">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10366">Spanje paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10366">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10367">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10367">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10368">een combinatie van letters en getallen met acht of negen tekens zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10368">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10369">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10369">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10370">een combinatie van letters en cijfers met acht of negen tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10370">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10371">twee cijfers of letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10371">two digits or letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10372">Ã©Ã©n cijfer of letter (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10372">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10373">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10373">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10374">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10374">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10375">Niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10375">Not applicable</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10376">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10376">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10377">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10377">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10378">Met de normale  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10378">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10379">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10379">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10380">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` indeling DD-MM-YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10380">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10381">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10381">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10382">Met de normale  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10382">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10383">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10383">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10412">Spanje sociaal-zekerheidsnummer (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10412">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10413">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10414">11-12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10414">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10415">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10416">11-12 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10416">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10417">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10417">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10418">a forward slash (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10418">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10419">zeven tot acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10419">seven to eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10420">a forward slash (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10420">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10421">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10421">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10422">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10422">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10423">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10423">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10424">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10424">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10425">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10425">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10426">De functie Func_spanish_social_security_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10426">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10427">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10427">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10428">Er wordt een  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10428">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10429">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10430">De functie Func_spanish_social_security_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10430">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10431">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10431">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10440">Btw-nummer van Spanje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10440">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10441">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10441">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10442">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10442">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10443">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10443">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10444">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10444">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10445">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10445">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10446">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10446">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10447">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10448">zeven of acht cijfers en een of twee letters in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10448">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10449">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10450">Spaanse natuurlijke personen met een Nationale identiteitskaart van Spanje:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10450">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10451">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10451">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10452">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10452">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10453">Niet-ingezetene Spanjaarden zonder spaanse nationale identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10453">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10454">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter 'L' (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10454">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10455">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10455">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10456">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10456">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10457">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10457">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10458">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter 'K' (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10458">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10459">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10459">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10460">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10460">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10461">Buitenlanders met het identificatienummer van een buitenlander</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10461">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10462">een hoofdletter met de naam 'X', 'Y' of 'Z' (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10462">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10463">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10463">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10464">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10464">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10465">Buitenlanders zonder het identificatienummer van een buitenlander</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10465">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10466">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter met de letter 'M' (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10466">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10467">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10467">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10468">Ã©Ã©n hoofdletter (hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10468">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10469">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10469">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10470">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10470">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10471">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10471">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10472">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10472">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10473">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10473">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10474">Er wordt een  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10474">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10475">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10475">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10476">De functie  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` of zoekt inhoud die overeenkomt met het `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10476">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10507">SQL Server verbindingsreeks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10507">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10508">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10509">De tekenreeks 'Gebruikers-id', 'Gebruikers-id', 'uid' of 'UserId' gevolgd door de tekens en tekenreeksen die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10509">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10510">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10510">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10511">de tekenreeks 'Gebruikers-id', 'Gebruikers-id', 'uid' of 'UserId'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10511">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10512">een combinatie van 1-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10512">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10513">de tekenreeks 'Wachtwoord' of 'pwd' waarbij 'pwd' niet wordt voorafgegaan door een kleine letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10513">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10514">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10514">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10515">een teken dat geen dollarteken ($), procentsymbool (%), groter dan symbool (>), bij symbool (@), aanhalingsteken ("), puntkomma (;), linkerbrace([) of linker vierkante haak ({)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10515">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10516">een combinatie van 7-128 tekens die geen puntkomma zijn (;), slash (/) of aanhalingsteken (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10516">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10517">een puntkomma (;) of aanhalingsteken (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10517">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10518">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10518">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10519">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10519">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10520">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10520">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10521">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10521">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10522">De normale expressie CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10522">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10523">Een trefwoord CEP_GlobalFilter wordt niet gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10523">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10524">De normale expressie CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon, wordt niet gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10524">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10525">In de CEP_CommonExampleKeywords wordt geen inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10525">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10553">Rijbewijsnummer van Zweden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10553">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10554">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10555">10 cijfers met een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10555">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10556">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10557">10 cijfers met een afbreekstreester:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10557">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10558">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10558">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10559">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10559">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10560">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10560">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10561">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10562">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10562">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10563">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10564">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10565">Met de normale  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10565">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10566">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10699">Zweedse nationale id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10699">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10700">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10701">10 of 12 cijfers en een optioneel scheidingsteken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10701">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10702">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10703">10 of 12 cijfers en een optioneel scheidingsteken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10703">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10704">twee cijfers (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10704">two digits (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10705">Zes cijfers in datumnotatie YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10705">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10706">scheidingsteken van "-" of "+" (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10706">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10707">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10707">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10708">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10709">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10709">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10710">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10711">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10712">Met de `Func_swedish_national_identifier` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10712">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10713">Er wordt een `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` trefwoord uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10713">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10714">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10714">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10715">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10715">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10716">Met de `Func_swedish_national_identifier` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10716">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10717">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10717">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10736">Zweden paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10736">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10737">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10738">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10738">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10739">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10740">acht opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10740">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10741">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10742">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10742">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10743">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10744">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10744">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10745">met de normale expressie Regex_sweden_passport_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10745">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10746">een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_sweden_passport` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10746">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10747">met de normale expressie wordt een datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10747">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10748">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10748">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10749">met de normale expressie Regex_sweden_passport_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10749">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10750">een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_sweden_passport` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10750">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10786">Btw-nummer zweden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10786">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10787">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10787">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10788">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10788">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10789">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10789">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10790">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10790">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10791">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10791">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10792">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10792">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10793">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10793">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10794">10 cijfers en een symbool in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10794">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10795">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10795">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10796">10 cijfers en een symbool:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10796">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10797">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10797">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10798">een plusteken of minteken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10798">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10799">drie cijfers die het identificatienummer uniek maken op de volgende plaatsen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10799">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10800">voor getallen die vÃ³Ã³r 1990 zijn uitgegeven, wordt met het zevende en achtste cijfer het geboorteland of de in het buitenland geboren personen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10800">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10801">het cijfer in de negende positie geeft geslacht aan door oneven voor mannelijke of zelfs voor vrouwelijke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10801">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10802">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10802">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10803">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10804">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10804">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10805">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10806">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10806">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10807">Met de  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10807">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10808">Er wordt een  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10808">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10809">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10809">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10810">Met de  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10810">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10836">SWIFT-code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10836">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10837">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10838">vier letters gevolgd door 5-31 letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10838">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10839">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10840">vier letters gevolgd door 5-31 letters of cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10840">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10841">bankcode met vier letters (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10841">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10842">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10842">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10843">4-28 letters of cijfers (het basisrekeningnummer (BBAN))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10843">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10844">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10844">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10845">Ã©Ã©n tot drie letters of cijfers (rest van de BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10845">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10846">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10846">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10847">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10847">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10848">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10848">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10849">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10849">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10850">De normale expressie Regex_swift inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10850">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10851">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_swift gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10851">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10888">Zwitserland SSN AHV-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10888">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10889">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10889">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10890">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10890">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10891">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10891">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10892">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10892">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10893">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10893">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10894">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10894">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10895">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10896">13-cijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10896">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10897">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10898">13-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10898">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10899">drie cijfers - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10899">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10900">een optionele punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10900">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10901">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10901">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10902">een optionele punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10902">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10903">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10903">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10904">een optionele punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10904">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10905">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10905">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10906">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10907">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10907">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10908">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10909">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10909">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10910">Met de Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10910">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10911">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10911">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10912">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10912">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10913">Met de Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10913">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10934">Taiwan national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10934">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10935">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10936">Ã©Ã©n letter (in het Engels) gevolgd door negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10936">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10937">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10938">een letter (in het Engels) gevolgd door negen cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10938">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10939">Ã©Ã©n letter (in het Engels, niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10939">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10940">het cijfer '1' of '2'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10940">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10941">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10941">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10942">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10942">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10943">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10943">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10944">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10944">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10945">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10945">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10946">Met de Func_taiwanese_national_id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10946">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10947">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_taiwanese_national_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10947">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10948">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10948">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10949">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10949">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10950">Met de Func_taiwanese_national_id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10950">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10951">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10951">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
