## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10968">Taiwan paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10968">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10969">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10969">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10970">biometrisch paspoortnummer: negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10970">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10971">niet-biometrisch paspoortnummer: negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10971">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10972">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10972">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10973">biometrisch paspoortnummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10973">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10974">het teken '3'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10974">the character "3"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10975">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10975">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10976">niet-biometrisch paspoortnummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10976">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10977">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10977">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10978">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10979">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10979">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10980">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10981">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10982">De normale expressie Regex_taiwan_passport inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10982">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10983">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_taiwan_passport gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10983">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10994">Taiwan-ingezeten certificaatnummer (ARC/TARC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10994">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10995">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10996">10 letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10996">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-10997">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-10998">10 letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10998">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-10999">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-10999">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11001">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11002">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11002">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11003">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11004">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11004">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11005">De normale expressie Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11005">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11006">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11006">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11020">Thaise bevolkingsidentificatiecode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11020">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11021">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11021">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11022">13 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11022">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11023">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11023">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11024">13 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11024">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11025">eerste cijfer is geen nul of negen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11025">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11026">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11026">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11027">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11027">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11028">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11028">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11029">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11029">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11030">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11030">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11031">Met de Func_Thai_Citizen_Id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11031">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11032">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11032">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11033">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11033">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11034">Met de Func_Thai_Citizen_Id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11034">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11043">Turks nationaal identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11043">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11047">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11047">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11048">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11048">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11049">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11049">Yes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11051">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11051">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11054">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11055">De functie Func_Turkish_National_Id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11055">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11062">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11062">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11063">rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11063">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11064">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11064">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11065">Combinatie van 18 letters en cijfers in de opgegeven notatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11065">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11066">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11067">18 letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11067">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11068">Vijf letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) of het cijfer '9' in plaats van een letter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11068">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11069">EÃ©n cijfer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11069">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11070">Vijf cijfers in de datumnotatie MMDDY voor geboortedatum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11070">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11071">Het zevende teken wordt verhoogd met 50 als het stuurprogramma een vrouw is. voor examen, 51 tot 62 in plaats van 01 tot 12.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11071">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11072">Twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) of het cijfer '9' in plaats van een letter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11072">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11073">Vijf cijfers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11073">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11074">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11075">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11075">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11076">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11077">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11077">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11078">Met de `Func_uk_drivers_license` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11078">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11079">Er wordt een `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11079">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11080">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11080">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11081">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11081">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11082">Met de `Func_uk_drivers_license` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11082">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11083">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11083">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11204">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11204">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11205">kieslijstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11205">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11206">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11206">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11207">twee letters gevolgd door 1-4 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11207">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11208">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11208">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11209">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) gevolgd door 1-4 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11209">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11210">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11210">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11211">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11211">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11212">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11212">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11213">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11213">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11214">De normale expressie Regex_uk_electoral inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11214">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11215">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_electoral gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11215">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11221">kieslijst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11221">electoral roll</span></span>


## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11222">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11222">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11223">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11223">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11224">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11224">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11225">10-17 cijfers gescheiden door spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11225">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11226">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11227">10-17 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11227">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11228">3 of 10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11228">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11229">een spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11229">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11230">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11230">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11231">een spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11231">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11232">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11232">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11233">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11234">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11234">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11235">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11236">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11236">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11237">De functie Func_uk_nhs_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11237">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11238">Een van de volgende gegevens is waar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11238">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11239">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_nhs_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11239">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11240">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11240">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11241">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11241">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11242">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11254">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11254">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11255">HUISARTS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11255">GP</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11260">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11260">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11261">national insurance number (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11261">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11262">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie maakt deel uit van het eu-nationale identificatienummer voor gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11262">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11263">Het is ook beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11263">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11264">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11265">zeven tekens of negen tekens gescheiden door spaties of streepjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11265">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11266">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11267">twee mogelijke patronen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11267">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11268">twee letters (geldige NINOs gebruiken alleen bepaalde tekens in dit voorvoegsel, dat door dit patroon wordt gevalideerd; niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11268">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11269">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11269">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11270">'A', 'B', 'C' of 'D' (net als het voorvoegsel zijn alleen bepaalde tekens toegestaan in het achtervoegsel; niet hoofd- en hoofdschruf)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11270">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11271">OF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11271">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11272">twee letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11272">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11273">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11273">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11274">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11274">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11275">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11275">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11276">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11276">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11277">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11277">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11278">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11278">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11279">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11279">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11280">'A', 'B', 'C' of 'D'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11280">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11281">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11282">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11282">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11283">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11284">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11284">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11285">De functie Func_uk_nino inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11285">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11286">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_nino gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11286">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11287">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11287">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11288">De functie Func_uk_nino inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11288">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11290">Keyword_uk_nino</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11290">Keyword_uk_nino</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11297">medische toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11297">medical application</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11298">sociale verzekering</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11298">social insurance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11299">medische hulp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11299">medical attention</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11300">sociale zekerheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11300">social security</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11301">Groot-BrittanniÃ«</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11301">great britain</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11302">NI-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11302">NI Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11303">NI Nee.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11303">NI No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11304">NI #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11304">NI #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11305">NI #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11305">NI#</span></span>

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11310">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11310">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11311">Uniek referentienummer voor belastingbetalers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11311">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11312">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11312">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11313">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11313">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11314">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11314">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11315">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11315">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11316">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11316">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11317">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11317">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11318">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11319">10 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11319">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>


### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11320">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11320">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11321">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11321">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11322">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11323">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11323">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11324">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11325">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11325">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11326">Met de  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11326">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11327">Er wordt een  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11327">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11347">Amerikaans bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11347">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11348">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11348">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11349">6-17 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11349">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11350">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11350">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11351">6-17 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11351">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11352">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11353">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11354">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11355">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11356">De normale expressie Regex_usa_bank_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11356">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11357">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_usa_Bank_Account gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11357">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11387">Amerikaans nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11387">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11388">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11389">Is afhankelijk van de status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11389">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11390">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11391">is afhankelijk van de staat, bijvoorbeeld New York:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11391">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11392">negen cijfers die zijn opgemaakt, zoals ddd ddd ddd, komen overeen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11392">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11393">negen cijfers zoals ddddddddd komen niet overeen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11393">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11394">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11395">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11395">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11396">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11397">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11397">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11398">De functie Func_new_york_drivers_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11398">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11399">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11399">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11400">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_us_drivers_license gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11400">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11401">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11401">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11402">De functie Func_new_york_drivers_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11402">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11403">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11403">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11404">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11404">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11405">Er wordt geen trefwoord Keyword_us_drivers_license gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11405">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11406">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11406">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11407">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11407">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11419">IDs #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11419">IDs#</span></span>

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11503">Amerikaans individueel nummer voor het identificeren van belastingbetalers (ITIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11503">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11504">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11504">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11505">negen cijfers die beginnen met een '9' en een '7' of '8' bevatten als het vierde cijfer, eventueel opgemaakt met spaties of streepjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11505">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11506">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11506">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11507">opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11507">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11508">het cijfer '9'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11508">the digit "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11509">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11509">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11510">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11510">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11511">een '7' of '8'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11511">a "7" or "8"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11512">een cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11512">a digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11513">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11513">a space, or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11514">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11514">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11515">niet-opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11515">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11516">het cijfer '9'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11516">the digit "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11517">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11517">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11518">een '7' of '8'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11518">a "7" or "8"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11519">vijf cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11519">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11520">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11521">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11522">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11523">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11523">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11524">Met de Func_formatted_itin wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11524">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11525">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_itin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11525">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11526">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11526">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11527">Met de Func_unformatted_itin wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11527">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11528">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_itin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11528">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11529">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11529">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11530">Met de functie Func_formatted_itin of Func_unformatted_itin wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11530">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11544">individuele belastingplichtige</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11544">individual taxpayer</span></span>


## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11545">Amerikaans sociaal-zekerheidsnummer (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11545">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11546">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11546">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11547">negen cijfers, die zich mogelijk in een opgemaakt of niet-opgemaakt patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11547">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11548">Als een SSN vÃ³Ã³r medio 2011 is uitgegeven, heeft een SSN een sterke opmaak waarbij bepaalde delen van het getal binnen bepaalde bereik moeten vallen om geldig te zijn (maar er is geen checksum).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11548">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11549">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11549">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11550">Vier functies zoeken naar SSN's in vier verschillende patronen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11550">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11551">Func_ssn vindt SSN's met een sterke opmaak van vÃ³Ã³r 2011 die zijn opgemaakt met streepjes of spaties (ddd-ddddd OR ddd ddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11551">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11552">Func_unformatted_ssn vindt SSN's met een sterke opmaak van vÃ³Ã³r 2011 die niet is opgemaakt als negen opeenvolgende cijfers (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11552">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11553">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn zoekt naar SSN's na 2011 die zijn opgemaakt met streepjes of spaties (ddd-dd-dddd OF ddd dd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11553">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11554">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn wordt na 2011 SSN's gevonden die niet zijn opgemaakt als negen opeenvolgende cijfers (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11554">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11555">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11556">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11556">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11557">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11558">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11558">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11559">De functie Func_ssn inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11559">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11560">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ssn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11560">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11561">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11561">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11562">Met de Func_unformatted_ssn wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11562">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11563">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ssn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11563">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11564">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11564">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11565">Met de Func_randomized_formatted_ssn wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11565">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11566">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ssn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11566">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11567">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11567">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11568">De functie Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11568">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11569">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ssn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11569">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11584">V.S. / VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11584">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11585">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11585">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11586">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11587">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11587">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11588">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11589">negen opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11589">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11590">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11590">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11591">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11591">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11592">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11592">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11593">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11593">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11594">De functie Func_usa_uk_passport inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11594">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11595">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11595">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11596">Er wordt een `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trefwoord uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11596">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11597">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11597">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11598">De functie Func_usa_uk_passport inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11598">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11599">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11599">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11615">OekraÃ¯ne paspoort binnenlands</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11615">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11616">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11616">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11617">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11617">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11618">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11618">communication compliance policies</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11622">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11623">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11623">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11624">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11625">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11625">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11626">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11627">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11627">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11628">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11629">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11629">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11630">In de regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11630">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11631">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11631">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11640">Oekraine paspoort internationaal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11640">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11641">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11641">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11642">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11642">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11643">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11643">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11644">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11644">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11645">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11645">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11646">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11646">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11647">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11647">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11648">alfanumeriek patroon met acht tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11648">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11649">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11649">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11650">alfanumeriek patroon met acht tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11650">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11651">twee letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11651">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11652">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11652">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11653">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11653">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11654">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11654">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="4f534-11655">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11655">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="4f534-11656">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11656">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11657">In de regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11657">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="4f534-11658">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="4f534-11658">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
